column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention and we are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with us. If you're open to it
column2: our management team would like to speak with you about this. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column3: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
